Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Service Resuming Normal Routing
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line service is resuming its normal routing, via the subway, btwn Fullerton & Cermak-Chinatown after an earlier reroute.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line service is resuming its normal routing, via the subway, between Fullerton & Cermak-Chinatown.

Trains were temporarily rerouted via the elevated lines due to a sick customer at Roosevelt.

Allow extra travel time.
